layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x112
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x112
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x81
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 213x19
          text run at (0,0) width 213: "There should be a green bar below:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (15,36) size 120x45 [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 120x30 [color=#FFFFFF] [bgcolor=#FFFFFF]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 105x15
            text run at (0,0) width 105: "x x x x"
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 15x15
            LayoutText {#text} at (105,0) size 15x15
              text run at (105,0) width 15: "x"
          LayoutText {#text} at (60,0) size 105x30
            text run at (60,0) width 45: "x x"
            text run at (0,15) width 105: "x x x x"
